channel.title: Can someone help me with hand cannon ? [PI]
channel.description: I've followed this tutorial for Hand cannon spec, tut : [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/332592-almost-100-hand-cannon-pi-dspk.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/332592-almost-100-hand-cannon-pi-dspk.html[/url] but everytime when i try to attack or spec it says : "you have run out of shots" even when i have like 2 bill shots in my equipment and its only when im attacking npcs, help me please

item.title: Can someone help me with hand cannon ? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @jelleplomp jelleplomp
item.description:
@jelleplomp wrote:

found the problem thanks btw

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me with hand cannon ? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @jelleplomp jelleplomp
item.description:
@jelleplomp wrote:

i’ve added this :
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15241) {
c.gfx0(2138);
}
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15241 && 15243 != c.playerEquipment[c.playerArrows]){
c.sendMessage(“You can’t use Hand Cannon without the shots!”);
return;
}

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me with hand cannon ? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15241)
					c.sendMessage("You have run out of Shots!");
				else

Make sure you’re adding this right, because that says if you attack an npc with that weapon, you have run out of shots.

Read full topic
